name: getmindfulnessquote
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool metaapi_mindfulness_quotes.
Tool description: Get a random quote about mindfulness from a list of 100 quotes.
API description: Fetches a random mindfulness quote, optionally filtered by author or category.

author.description: The author of the quote. Defaults to None.

category.description: The category of the quote. Defaults to None.
